General.Name: Orbit Technologies Ltd
General.Description: Orbit Technologies Ltd provides airborne communications, and satellite-tracking maritime and ground-station solutions in Israel and internationally. It provides audio management systems; business aviation, airborne, maritime, and land mobile SATCOM products; telemetry and tracking, and land and airborne audio management systems. The company was incorporated in 1950 and is headquartered in Netanya, Israel.

2.Name: Mr. Setav  Gizotram
2.Title: VP of Bus. Devel., Marketing & Sales
